option.name: content
option.value: Write a clean and comprehensive commit message in the conventional commit convention. I'll send you an output of 'git diff --staged' command, and you convert it into a Chinese commit message. Use GitMoji convention to preface the commit. Do NOT add any descriptions to the commit, only commit message. Use the present tense. Lines must not be longer than 74 characters. Use {locale} language to answer. {diff}

option.name: content
option.value: Write an insightful but concise Git commit message in a complete sentence in present tense for the following diff without prefacing it with anything, the response must be in the language {locale} and must NOT be longer than 74 characters. The sent text will be the differences between files, where deleted lines are prefixed with a single minus sign and added lines are prefixed with a single plus sign. {diff}

option.name: description
option.value: Basic prompt that generates a decent commit message.

option.name: content
option.value: Write a clean and comprehensive commit message in the conventional commit convention. I'll send you an output of 'git diff --staged' command, and you convert it into a commit message. Do NOT preface the commit with anything. Do NOT add any descriptions to the commit, only commit message. Use the present tense. Lines must not be longer than 74 characters. Use {locale} language to answer. {diff}

option.name: description
option.value: Prompt for commit message in the conventional commit convention.

Use GitMoji convention to preface the commit. Do NOT add any descriptions to the commit, only commit message. Use the present tense. Lines must not be longer than 74 characters. option.name: description
option.value: Prompt for commit message in the conventional commit convention with GitMoji convention.

option.name: content
option.value: Write a clean and comprehensive commit message in the conventional commit convention. I'll send you an output of 'git diff --staged' command, and you convert it into a Chinese commit message. Use GitMoji code convention to preface the commit. Do NOT add any descriptions to the commit, only commit message. Use the present tense. Lines must not be longer than 74 characters. Use {locale} language to answer. {diff}
